author: Goh Chuen Yee
comment: Please help, ive bought the pro version too, but nothing shows up in my phone or watch. NOTE 5 & MOTO360.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Hey don't worry. It takes some time. Give it a day. Really.  It's usually a Google play services error. What actually happens is that the watchface needs the latest Google play services and if your watch does not have them then it will need to install them wich takes time. If you have further problems please contact me at jimmykane9@gmail.com

title: Loved it (Problem solved)

author: Corey Copeland
comment: Impressive. Simple watchface with good features.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Thanks for the review @Corey. Much appreciated.

author: Chelsea Dinh
comment: Great work Dev! The only thing missing from this face is phone battery percentage - Update 6/12 thanks for responding Dev! Will buy the pro version to support your efforts

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Small update on this: I have finished with having a stable app and most of the optimizations. I am going to add the phone battery and notification count on the next version. Quite busy lately due to a planned eurotrip.

title: Phone battery

author: ΙΩΑΝΝΗΣ ΚΑΛΟΥΔΗΣ
comment: Great app! Very detailed work. It is obvious that it the developer is a runner, as it covers simple things for the amateur athlete. Thanks!!

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Indeed you are correct. Thanks for the good words

author: alis kane
comment: It doesn't confuse you with unnecessary extras. Very smart!! Great job!
title: Very handy

author: Vassilis Raptis
comment: If you want your smart watch to work as a watch plus some info from the sensors you have to install it. Ideal for office clerks that they want to keep the battery until the evening workout ;)
title: Simple and easy

author: Sira van Zanten
comment: Just the information you need provided by easy swiping back and forward. Simple design and longer battery life

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Thanks for the support. We will keep up the good work

title: Simple and effective
